text.div:
BiRadCodeVs ValueSet

Bi-Rad code value Current terminology for this value set has not been specified, but the terminology selected will include terminology values with the following meanings. | Code | Meaning | |:-------------|:-----| BIRAD5HighlySuggestive | Highly Suggestive of Malignancy BIRAD0Incomplete | Need Additional Imaging Evaluation and/or Prior Mammograms for Comparison BIRAD1Negative | Negative Finding BIRAD2Benign | Non cancerous finding BIRAD3ProbablyBenign | Probably non-cancerous. BIRAD4ALowSuspicion | Low suspicion for Malignancy BIRAD4BModerateSuspicion | Moderate Suspicion for Malignancy BIRAD4CHighSuspicion | High Suspicion of Malignancy BIRAD6ProvenMalignancy | Known Biopsy-Proven Malignancy

name: BiRadCodeVs
title: BiRadCodeVs
description:
Bi-Rad code value


Current terminology for this value set has not been specified, but the terminology selected
will include terminology values with the following meanings.

| Code | Meaning |
|:-------------|:-----|
BIRAD5HighlySuggestive | Highly Suggestive of Malignancy
BIRAD0Incomplete | Need Additional Imaging Evaluation and/or Prior Mammograms for Comparison
BIRAD1Negative | Negative Finding
BIRAD2Benign | Non cancerous finding
BIRAD3ProbablyBenign | Probably non-cancerous.
BIRAD4ALowSuspicion | Low suspicion for Malignancy
BIRAD4BModerateSuspicion | Moderate Suspicion for Malignancy
BIRAD4CHighSuspicion | High Suspicion of Malignancy
BIRAD6ProvenMalignancy | Known Biopsy-Proven Malignancy

concept.display: Need Additional Imaging Evaluation and/or Prior Mammograms for Comparison
